EmailTemplate.subject: Strength Training and Fitness Club
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We would like to inform you that we now offer a Strength Training and Fitness Club for Years 9 - 10 students. Please click on the below link for further information and registration details.
Strength Training and Fitness Club (https://drive.google.com/a/britishschools.co.uk/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xd3pENjFNZmJpYUhDUndfcWV1Z1dDWGR2NGpn/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards,
Harrie Thomson Director of Physical Education and Sport British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
